biotools.summary: pytximport is a Python package for efficient (gene-)count estimation from transcript quantification files produced by pseudoalignment/quasi-mapping tools such as salmon, kallisto, rsem and others.

bioschemas.name: pytximport
bioschemas.summary: pytximport is a Python package for efficient (gene-)count estimation from transcript quantification files produced by pseudoalignment/quasi-mapping tools such as salmon, kallisto, rsem and others.
